dx-empty - Sys

Class Sys

public inherited sharing class Sys

Description: Contains methods for custom system operations, such as writing debug messages References:

Changes

03/17/2023 Initial version.

Members

  Modifiers and Type Name Description
public static void
debug(Object message)
Writes the specified message, in string format with trace information, to the execution debug log.
public static void
debug(String label, Object message)
Writes the specified message preceded by a label (if included), in string format with trace information, to the execution debug log.

Writes the specified message preceded by a label (if included), in string format to the execution debug log.

Writes the specified message, in JSON format with trace information, to the execution debug log.

Writes the specified message preceded by a label (if included), in JSON format with trace information, to the execution debug log.

Writes the specified message preceded by a label (if included), in JSON format to the execution debug log.

debugNt(String label, Object message)
Writes the specified message preceded by a label (if included), in string format WITHOUT trace information, to the execution debug log.

Methods

public static void debug(Object message)

Writes the specified message, in string format with trace information, to the execution debug log. The DEBUG log level is used.

Parameters:
    message – (Object) The message to write in string format to the execution debug log

public static void debug(
  String label,
  Object message
)

Writes the specified message preceded by a label (if included), in string format with trace information, to the execution debug log. The DEBUG log level is used.

Parameters:
    label – (String) The label to show after the trace information and before the message itself
    message – (Object) The message to write in string format to the execution debug log

public static void debug(
  String label,
  Object message,
  Boolean showTraceInfo
)

Writes the specified message preceded by a label (if included), in string format to the execution debug log. Optionally trace information could be included detailing the class and method names, and line number. The DEBUG log level is used.

Parameters:
    label – (String) The label to show after the trace information (if showTraceInfo is true) and before the message itself
    message – (Object) The message to write in string format to the execution debug log
    showTraceInfo – (Boolean) If true, the message is preceded with trace information detailing class and method names, and line number.

public static void debugJson(Object message)

Writes the specified message, in JSON format with trace information, to the execution debug log. The DEBUG log level is used.

Parameters:
    message – (Object) The message to write in JSON format to the execution debug log

public static void debugJson(
  String label,
  Object message
)

Writes the specified message preceded by a label (if included), in JSON format with trace information, to the execution debug log. The DEBUG log level is used.

Parameters:
    label – (String) The label to show after the trace information and before the message itself
    message – (Object) The message to write in JSON format to the execution debug log

public static void debugJson(
  String label,
  Object message,
  Boolean showTraceInfo
)

Writes the specified message preceded by a label (if included), in JSON format to the execution debug log. Optionally trace information could be included detailing the class and method names, and line number. The DEBUG log level is used.

Parameters:
    label – (String) The label to show after the trace information (if showTraceInfo is true) and before the message itself
    message – (Object) The message to write in JSON format to the execution debug log
    showTraceInfo – (Boolean) If true, the message is preceded with trace information detailing class and method names, and line number.

public static void debugJsonNt(Object message)

Writes the specified message, in JSON format WITHOUT trace information, to the execution debug log. The DEBUG log level is used.

Parameters:
    message – (Object) The message to write in JSON format to the execution debug log

public static void debugJsonNt(
  String label,
  Object message
)

Writes the specified message preceded by a label (if included), in JSON format WITHOUT trace information, to the execution debug log. The DEBUG log level is used.

Parameters:
    label – (String) The label to show before the message itself
    message – (Object) The message to write in JSON format to the execution debug log

public static void debugNt(Object message)

Writes the specified message, in string format WITHOUT trace information, to the execution debug log. The DEBUG log level is used.

Parameters:
    message – (Object) The message to write in string format to the execution debug log

public static void debugNt(
  String label,
  Object message
)

Writes the specified message preceded by a label (if included), in string format WITHOUT trace information, to the execution debug log. The DEBUG log level is used.

Parameters:
    label – (String) The label to show before the message itself
    message – (Object) The message to write in string format to the execution debug log
